attributes.action: Compulsory that virgin has to donate all ‘profits’ from donations to the NHS
attributes.background: Government to review and enforce that virgin has to give all of the profits they made through their donation site from the 5k for £5 NHS funding to the NHS

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Virgin, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you want to donate directly to the NHS, you can find out how here: https://www.nhscharitiestogether.co.uk/.
